Player History
Moved to the US and entered the free agent pool in 2021.
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/8/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $12,500,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/4/2021, off Jenrry Mejia (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/7/2021, off Nick Travieso (LAD)...
Injured on 8/30/2021 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Cincinnati to Los Angeles (N) on 7/31/2022 (Going to CIN: P Calvin Joseph. Going to LAD: P Mark Appel, SS Tokutomi Kiyomasu)...
